title: Login issue
body: I start league, fill in my username and password, click on login button but nothing really happens. I have to wait for like 10 mins and then it says there's some error. Tried to reistall, tried to change the options in internet explorers, tried the old client.... nothing really works. I've been trying to fix it like 5 hours, because the weather is terrible and I have nothing to do. {{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Without knowing the error, it sounds like your connection can't reach the authentication server if it's taking that long.  The authentication server never gets a chance to check your login info because it never gets to us.  A reinstall wouldn't really fix this, but tuning up your connection could help!  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and resolve any blocks along the way.  Dry those tears, and let me know if you have any questions!  {{summoner:31}}
Tears are gone, so are the problems. Thank you mr. Summoner, thank you for helping me. {{champion:33}}  {{summoner:1}} The forwarding thing helped me.
